original_text: Now there is in Jerusalem near the Sheep Gate a pool, which in Aramaic is called Bethesda and which is surrounded by five covered colonnades.
korean_text: 예루살렘에 있는 양문 곁에 히브리 말로 베데스다라 하는 못이 있는데 거기 행각 다섯이 있고

sentences.original_text: Now there is in Jerusalem near the Sheep Gate
which in Aramaic is called Bethesda
and which is surrounded by five covered colonnades
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다섯 개의 지붕 있는 회랑으로 둘러싸여 있다
